ModMetaData.name: Linux Performance Optimizations
ModMetaData.author: Anten Skrabec
ModMetaData.description:
Performance optimizations for RimWorld on Linux.
Features: • Transparent Huge Pages (THP) for improved memory performance • GameMode integration for CPU governor optimizations
Both features are enabled automatically on startup and can be configured in mod settings. Gracefully does nothing on Windows/macOS.
Source: https://github.com/cebarks/rimworld-linux-misc
